Articles.Content: I have been playing around with both Snjo's Firespitter Parts and Hooligan Labs' Airship addons recently and I have been struggling to make successful craft. I was wondering if anyone had any crafts that they have made sitting about such as larger helicopters or "Blimp" type airships? Please share any if you have since I am completely useless when it comes to making helicopters and Blimps.

If you also have NovaPunch (for the wings), you can take my Aeos Z-3 out for a spin.

(All but the last couple of pics are from the Z-2 test article, so there are some minor differences.)

Top sustained speed is about 92m/sec. Buoyancy ceiling is 9200m, but at maximum speed the stub wings generate enough lift to reach 11000m.

NOTE: You must manually reverse the rear-facing props via right-click menus before take-off. I used the forward-facing props all around because they can be toggled into reverse for braking or backing the craft up.

Action Group 1 toggles all the engines on/off.

Action Group 2 toggles all the props into reverse and back to normal.

You may want to right click the tail-rotor to increase it's power, to improve your turning rate. Activating the Avionics Package (SAS mode) during all but the most extreme maneuvers is recommended.

Edited May 5, 2013 by RoboRay
